## Usage

This presentation uses the following document yaml header:

```yaml
---
title: nbis-quarto revealjs presentation
author: John Doe
institute: NBIS
date: today
format:
  nbis-quarto-revealjs:
    ultitle: true
    header-logo-left-url: https://nbis.se
    header-logo-right-url: https://scilifelab.se
---
```

By default NBIS and SciLifeLab logos are included in the header.
Clicking the logos will redirect to the provided urls.

## Underlined titles

Various different title formats are supported. For instance, the
`ultitle` used here produces titles underlined with a green bar.

```yaml
format:
  nbis-course-revealjs:
    ultitle: true
```

## Title without underline{ultitle=false}

Underlined titles can be skipped on individual slides by adding
`ultitle=false` to the heading:

```markdown
## Title without underline {ultitle=false}
```

## Color customizations

Colors follow the [SciLifeLab visual identity
guidelines](https://www.scilifelab.se/community-pages/resources/visual-identity).
Theme colors are used to colorize elements, including:

- **strong**

- blockquotes

    > This is a quote

- code

```python
import numpy as np
```

- links: [nbis](https://nbis.se/)
